title: Using Math to Pick Your Bracket, FOMC Preview, Impact of Legal Gambling on NCAA Tourney
itunes:title: Using Math to Pick Your Bracket, FOMC Preview, Impact of Legal Gambling on NCAA Tourney
description:
Tim Chartier, Math Professor at Davidson College, explains teaching bracket methods for the NCAA Men’s Basketball tournament as a part of math modeling. Janelle Woodward, President of Fixed Income at BMO Global Asset Management, previews Wednesday’s Federal Reserve rate decision, she says the introduction of patience takes a March hike off the table. Jason Robins, CEO at DraftKings, discusses how states legalizing gambling will impact March Madness betting. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
